title: Exploiting Data Partitioning To Provide Approximate Results
abstract: Co-hash partitioning is a popular partitioning strategy in distributed query processing, where tables are co-located using join predicates. In this paper, we study the benefits of co-hash partitioning for obtaining approximate answers.

journal.name: Proceedings of the 5th ACM SIGMOD Workshop on Algorithms and Systems for MapReduce and Beyond
